title:
Correlators of $\mathcal{N}=4$ SYM on real projective space at strong
  coupling
abstract:
We consider type IIB supergravity on a $\mathbb{Z}_2$ quotient of
AdS$_5\times$S$^5$ as the holographic dual of strongly coupled 4d
$\mathcal{N}=4$ SYM on $\mathbb{RP}^4$ space with the gauging of charge
conjugation. Using bootstrap techniques, we determine all two-point functions
of $\frac{1}{2}$-BPS operators of arbitrary weights at the leading order in the
large central charge expansion.
